task.title: Set up 1-Way Paging
task.shortdesc: Paging is used to make an announcement over the speakerphone to a phone or group of phones. The called parties will not ring, but instead answer immediately into speakerphone mode.

p.note: Paging is typically one way for announcements only.

step.cmd: Go to Settings PBX Call Features Paging/Intercom , click Add.

choices.choice: Number: Use the default or specify an number for the paging group.
Name: Enter a name for the paging group.

Dial * to Answer: If this option is checked, the paging group members can dial * to talk to the paging initiator. When a member dials *, the group announcement will terminate, and the member who dials * can have a private call with the paging initiator.
Member: Choose the group members to the Selected box.

taskbody.result: When you dial the paging group number, the members in the group will hear the announcement.
